"A.D.2028/4/24/14:00": "This is Ardem's doing. The result of forcing evolution upon a living being... They're unable to adapt, and are transformed into monsters."
"Forcing an undesired evolution... That's nothing but blasphemy against the humans living today."
"There's no time to make preparations. If she ever gets lost, or can't make that decision... You know what to do, right?"
